short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Data Wallet privacy extension is an add-on that allows users to browse the internet privately and ad-free.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Data Wallet privacy extension is an add-on that allows users to browse the internet privately and ad-free. 

The extension blocks unwanted third-party ads and blocks unnecessary tracking .

If current user already registered on Data Wallet website - extension will send visited pages urls and blocked request to site for collecting statistics that will be shown to user
